column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''13''' is the thirteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "The Way to 'Revived' Elvish: A Cornish Model?" — [[Alexei Kondratiev]].
* "A Survey of Ring Poem Translations" — [[Jorge Quiñónez]].

* "Transitions in Translations" (column)<ref>Contents of the column: "'Edition Shifting' in the German Hobbit, Part 1"; "More about Appendices", by [[Nathalie Kotowski]].</ref> — edited by [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
